title: Fiat Chrysler is reportedly withdrawing its merger proposal ... - Reddit
body: 34M subscribers in the worldnews community. A place for major news from around the world, excluding US-internal news.
readable_content:
mvanigan (2019-06-05): Fiat Chrysler is reportedly withdrawing its merger proposal for Renault
- ElectronX_Core: Thank fucking god this world doesn’t need any more mergers
